post.description: Enable or disable the different payment channel options of a card. By default, all payment channels are enabled for card use. If a channel is disabled, any transaction from that card for the channel is blocked. Note that some channels might not be applicable. The standard ones are: ATM, POS, ECOM, and MOTO.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: The authorization token sent for every API request

201.description: Success - Responds with the card's payment channel settings

400.description: Error - Validation on missing or invalid request parameter
